knockout.translation[0].definitions[0].d: when a boxer hits his opponent so hard that he falls down and cannot get up again
knockout.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The fight ended in a knockout.
knockout.translation[0].definitions[1].d: someone or something that is very attractive or successful
knockout.translation[0].definitions[2].d: a type of competition in which only the winning players or teams at each stage continue to play until there is only one winner

knockout.translation[2].definitions[0].d: an arrangement in which people who are trying to buy the same thing agree not to compete against each other on the price
